com.ephesoft.dcma.batch.status

Class StatusConveyor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.batch.status.StatusConveyor

  • public final class StatusConveyor
extends java.lang.Object
    Conveys and Notifies the status of services under failover mechanism. Provides utility to register services under host server.

    The StatusConveyor class provides services for checking whether a given service type is allowed to be run on the server or some other server is running the same services. It also registers the service under the server if it is not already registered under some other servers.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    ServiceType

      void notifyServiceEvent(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> paramMap, ServiceType serviceType)

    • Method Detail

      • getStatusConveyor

        public static StatusConveyor getStatusConveyor()
        Returns the instance of Status Conveyor and also initialises the map for service registration.
        Returns:
        StatusConveyor instance of StatusConveyor.

      • checkForServiceStatus

        public boolean checkForServiceStatus(ServiceType serviceType)
        Checks the status of service passed by first checking whether service is registered under some server or not, if not it adds that service under the current server otherwise check it checks if it is registered under current server. If it is registered under current server it return true otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        serviceType - ServiceType type of service for which status has to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if registered under current server otherwise false.

      • notifyServiceEvent

        public void notifyServiceEvent(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> paramMap,
                      ServiceType serviceType)
        Notifies any service event to fired on current server but needs to be handled by the server under which the service is registered. It hits the particular server with the details required and registered server handles it respectively.
        Parameters:
        paramMap - Map details to be send to the server.
        serviceType - ServiceType type of service.
